metadata.synopsis: A player left Ketheric's stone in the Astral Plane when they ended their camp night in Intermezzo. The Emperor is kind enough to send the stone to their camp chest and give them a bit of shit.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load INT_Main_AUse debugbook to get Ketheric's stoneStart the night eventGo through the portalDrop the stoneComplete the night

0.text: You left Ketheric's stone behind. I sent it to your camp.

1.text: Try not to be so careless once you possess the others.
